title: Can't change password 'cuz email pass doesn't work and recovery email doesn't also :cc
body: Well, the title says it all. I try to change my password on my other account (because it doesn't work), but I can't because my yahoo email password isn't working. I click "forgot password?" and it brings me to the recovery email/number thing. I made this email a long time ago, so I don't remember the recover email's password (or the email got deleted??) and I don't have a recovery number. I know this might be the wrong place to be typing this discussion, but I just wanted to know from Riot to see if they can do anything about it. It's my fault anyways that my pass for my lol account doesn't work because of a dumb thing I did xd. If not, just let me know so I can stop worrying about it please <3

replies.body: Thanks! but my friend actually helped me out getting my yahoo email to work so now I have my acc back! I appreciate the help though ^~^
Excellent! Have fun testing our new Advanced AI Bots ^_^!
